thread.title: BRIEF-Boeing Says ‍Saudi Arabian Military Industries And Co Form Joint Venture Partnership

title: BRIEF-Boeing Says ‍Saudi Arabian Military Industries And Co Form Joint Venture Partnership

organizations.name: saudi arabian military industries and co form joint venture
and co form joint venture partnership reuters

text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Boeing:
* ‍SAUDI ARABIAN MILITARY INDUSTRIES AND BOEING FORM JOINT VENTURE PARTNERSHIP TARGETING 55% LOCALIZATION​
* ‍JV PARTNERSHIP TARGETING 55% LOCALIZATION WITH REVENUES TO EXCEED $22 BILLION AND 6,000 JOBS BY 2030​
* ‍PARTNERSHIP TO PROVIDE SUSTAINMENT SERVICES FOR FIXED- AND ROTARY-WING MILITARY AIRCRAFT OF KSA MILITARY FLEET​
* ‍INVESTMENT VALUE TO REACH $450 MILLION IN FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT INSIDE KINGDOM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
